author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-2073] Add the derbytools jar as described in the Tomcat install docs.  Use a separate resources directory for pom-it.xml tests.

author: sobryan
msg: TRINIDAD-1376: NullPointerException because RequestContext released after action request.
TRINIDAD-1351: On a redirect the URL is not being properly encoded for portals.
TRINIDAD-1383: Update to support latest changes in portlet-bridge.
This patch fixes the above Portal related bugs for Trinidad.  Here is what was done:
* The portlet bridge api was added to the Trinidad API project which now uses the bridge's @ExcludeFromManagedRequestScope annotaton on the RequestStateMap
* Added a new RequestStateMap utility that has a request map which spans one action request and the following render request.  Most of the configurator state was enhanced to use this map.
* Fixed a problem in ExternalContextUtils where it was incorrectly identifying action requests in a portal environment if the RenderRequest was a subclass of the ServletRequest object
* Fixed an encoding issue before the redirect in the CoreRenderkit
Thanks to Felix, Robert, and Nathan for finding these issues, submitting patches, and helping to test the final fixes.
